title: Going, Going, Gone...But Not Forgotten
description: GOING, GOING, GONE...BUT NOT FORGOTTEN is the story of WAWT, the main character, losing its best friends, Jason and Rachel, as they prepare to go to Australia for a year with their mother. It talks about saying goodbye and dealing with the sadness of being separated. This is an interactive book where kids are encouraged to use their imagination to draw and write their own story.
author: M.H. Ackerman
